name: Burlesque Black Peacock Fascinator Clip
description:
This piece is perfect for anyone wanting something a little different to the natural peacock headpiece. Although all the feathers have been dyed black, the peacock’s natural teals and greens transform into the wonderful iridescent petrol purples and greens you can see in the picture. The flower at the front of the headpiece is constructed from beads and mounted on a large flower button measuring 2.5” in diameter.

This lightweight feathered clip comb measures around 6” front to back and is mounted with an elastic and a clip for extra security. 

Other colours, fixtures and designs are available, just message me with your request. 
If you want it to look a little more flamboyant extra feathers and embellishments can also be added.

** THIS ITEM IS READY TO SHIP**
I aim to dispatch items via Royal Mail First Class (unless alternative is requested) within 48 hours of receiving the order (if you require other colours it may take a couple of days longer). Other options are available for quicker services.
I guarantee regular contact and updates to ensure the peace of mind you need in keeping up to date with your order progress. Once it is ready it will be boxed, securely packaged and shipped out you. 

For more images of this item please visit my ETSY shop www.soobird.etsy.com


If you have any questions please feel free to contact me and i will respond ASAP.

name: Queen of Hearts Playing Card Flower Fascinator
description:
Here is another version of the popular QOH comb also available in my shop. 

This design is a perfect addition to any Alice in Wonderland inspired outfit. The playing cards can be adapted to suit your requirements, just recently I was requested to create one with only the Queen of Hearts surrounding the button. The black and red pipped cards are an alternative to the traditional red and blue, however this design can be created using any of the cards you see in my shop. If there is a particular colour combination you require I am positive I will be able to create it for you. 

The headband is cushioned with a ribbon rosette offering extra comfort. 

The diameter of the flower including feathers is 6”/15cm and it is between 8”/20cm and 9”/23cm. If less height is wanted the wired hearts can be bent into position.

Other colours, fixtures and designs are available, just message me with your request. If you want it to look a little more flamboyant extra feathers and embellishments can also be added.

I aim to dispatch items within 48 hours of receiving the order - this depends, of course, on the nature of the order (if you require other colours it may take a couple of days longer). I guarantee regular contact and updates to ensure the peace of mind you need in keeping up to date with your order progress. Once it is ready it will be boxed, securely packaged and shipped out you. 

The shipping prices are for the following services: UK Next Day (by 1pm), EU Int. Signed For (5 days) and Everywhere Else Int. Signed For (5-10 days). 

If you are happy for the item not to be tracked the prices will be a lot cheaper. Please contact me for info.

If you require further information please feel free to contact me or to view more images of this piece please visit my ETSY shop.

name: Rockabilly Horror Comic Book Flower Fascinator or Brooch
description:
THE BEYOND no 10,
April 1952

This design is perfect for anyone who wants to wear something a little different. It would especially appeal to any vintage horror loving comic book readers.

I have arranged the images and the feathers so they tell a story. 
The damsel in distress (turquoise feather) is being chased by devil creatures (red and black feathers) as her fiance (egg shell blue/grey feathers) looks on helpless. The older man (ivory feathers for an angel) is trying to rescue her from the clutches of the fiery beasts and reaches out to her. I have no idea if this has anything to do with it but from the pictures I have used it works! 

The ACE button represents Ace magazines, Inc and has been hand embroidered. The french knots represent the pixels in some of the imagery.

♦ ♣ ♥ ♠

The flower is mounted on double hair clip and brooch fastening so it can be worn either as a headpiece or on clothing and accessories. The flower measures 6”/15cm in diameter including feathers and weighs 13g.

Although this truly is a one-off piece, other colours, fixtures and designs are available, just message me with your request. If you want it to look a little more flamboyant extra feathers and embellishments can also be added.

I aim to dispatch items within 48 hours of receiving payment. Once it is ready it will be boxed, securely packaged and shipped out you. 

The shipping prices are for the following services: UK First Class (1-3 days) and Overseas Airmail (delivery aim 5 days). If you require further information or a faster shipping method please feel free to contact me.

If you require further information please feel free to contact me or to view more images of this piece please visit my ETSY shop. 
www.soobird.etsy.com

name: Day of the Dead Fascinator
description:
This truly is a one off. 
I stumbled upon this deck of cards last year and couldn’t resist turning them into this unique design. Perfect for a halloween party!

Each petal is hand cut and carefully considered. A mixture of feathers have been added to the design to compliment the colours of the cards.

This piece is lightweight and has been mounted on a clear hair comb. 

If you would like more information about other fixtures and fittings please contact me and I will be happy to discuss your requirements.

This item is ready to ship and will be dispatched via Royal Mail Recorded Delivery (UK), Airmail (Everywhere Else) within 1-3 days of receiving the payment. If you decide you would like something similar (bearing in mind I have very few of these cards left) or to customise the design it may take a little longer to get to you, however I guarantee regular contact and updates to ensure the peace of mind you need in keeping up to date with your order progress. Once it is ready it will be boxed, securely packaged and shipped out you, I will notify you so you know it is on it’s way.

If you require your item sooner please contact me for additional shipping options as they are available.

♦ ♣ ♥ ♠
